nodes.text: A Festive Gathering was a painting that was available in the galaxy during the Galactic Civil War at some point after the Battle of Yavin. It was created to commemorate a festive gathering. It depicted a group consisting of a male Zabrak Force-sensitive wielding a lightsaber with a blue blade, a male Rodian, a female Twi'lek, and a male Wookiee fending off an attack from three stormtroopers and the Sith Lord Darth Vader.

A Festive Gathering appeared as a decoration for the player's house in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, which was released on June 26, 2003 and shut down on December 15, 2011. It was a special incentive for those that attended the 2007 Star Wars Galaxies Community Summit held by Sony Online Entertainment.
